text: Piper distigmatum is a species of plant in the family Piperaceae. It is endemic to Panama. ==References== * Mitré, M. 1998. Piper distigmatum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Flora of Panama distigmatum Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Piper distigmatum
